# subscript(_:)

**Instance Subscript**

Accesses one of the array’s blit pass sample buffer attachment descriptor instances.

## Declaration

```swift
subscript(attachmentIndex: Int) -> MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor! { get set }
```

## Parameters

- **attachmentIndex**: An index of one of the array’s [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLBlitPassSampleBufferAttachmentDescriptor] instances.
